message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice, as I believe it's fair considering the risk of inflation.
I propose a 60/40 split in favor of me, as I think my proposal is more generous than yours.
Considering the risk of inflation, I propose an equal division of the $10000. This ensures both of us receive a fair share, despite the diminishing value of money with each passing round.
